Service Details: - Provides Practical Assistance through food assistance, clothing and basic essential household items, and the children's backpack program and Christmas hamper seasonal programs- Provides Support Assistance through caseworkers program referrals, spiritual support, a variety of training programs, the Breakthrough program, missing persons tracing, income tax assistance (during tax season), and mentoring
Eligibility: Families and singles who are low-income or in emergency situations
Cost: None - Assessment required through an appointment with a caseworker
